mapper.sql: FS_AUDITNO, FI_AUDITTYPE, FS_ID, FS_NAME, FS_TANAME, FS_LICENCENO, FS_TAXLICENCE, FS_CONTACT, FS_CERTID, FS_EMAIL, FT_APPLYTIME, FS_AUDITOR, FT_AUDITTIME, FI_AUDITRET, FS_COMMENT
mapper.insert: insert into TCUSTCHGAU (FS_AUDITNO, FI_AUDITTYPE, FS_ID, FS_NAME, FS_TANAME, FS_LICENCENO, FS_TAXLICENCE, FS_CONTACT, FS_CERTID, FS_EMAIL, FT_APPLYTIME, FS_AUDITOR, FT_AUDITTIME, FI_AUDITRET, FS_COMMENT ) values (#{auditno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{audittype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licenceno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxlicence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{audittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{auditret,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

FS_AUDITNO,
FI_AUDITTYPE,
FS_ID,

mapper.update:
update TCUSTCHGAU
FI_AUDITTYPE = #{audittype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FS_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FS_NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FS_TANAME = #{taname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FS_LICENCENO = #{licenceno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FS_TAXLICENCE = #{taxlicence,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FS_CONTACT = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FS_CERTID = #{certid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FS_EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FT_APPLYTIME = #{applytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FS_AUDITOR = #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FT_AUDITTIME = #{audittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FI_AUDITRET = #{auditret,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FS_COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where FS_AUDITNO = #{auditno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TCUSTCHGAU set FI_AUDITTYPE = #{audittype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FS_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FS_NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FS_TANAME = #{taname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FS_LICENCENO = #{licenceno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FS_TAXLICENCE = #{taxlicence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FS_CONTACT = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FS_CERTID = #{certid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FS_EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FT_APPLYTIME = #{applytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FS_AUDITOR = #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FT_AUDITTIME = #{audittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FI_AUDITRET = #{auditret,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FS_COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where FS_AUDITNO = #{auditno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from TCUSTCHGAU where 1=1
and FS_AUDITNO like '%'||#{auditno}||'%'
and FI_AUDITTYPE = #{audittype}
and FS_ID like '%'||#{id}||'%'
and FS_NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%'
and FS_TANAME like '%'||#{taname}||'%'
and FS_LICENCENO like '%'||#{licenceno}||'%'
and FS_TAXLICENCE like '%'||#{taxlicence}||'%'
and FS_CONTACT like '%'||#{contact}||'%'
and FS_CERTID like '%'||#{certid}||'%'
and FS_EMAIL like '%'||#{email}||'%'
and FT_APPLYTIME = to_date(#{applytime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and FS_AUDITOR like '%'||#{auditor}||'%'
and FT_AUDITTIME = to_date(#{audittime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and FI_AUDITRET = #{auditret}
and FS_COMMENT like '%'||#{comment}||'%'

select * from (select ROWNUM as rowno, t.* from TCUSTCHGAU t where 1=1
and FS_AUDITNO like '%'||#{auditno}||'%'
and FI_AUDITTYPE = #{audittype}
and FS_ID like '%'||#{id}||'%'
and FS_NAME like '%'||#{name}||'%'
and FS_TANAME like '%'||#{taname}||'%'
and FS_LICENCENO like '%'||#{licenceno}||'%'
and FS_TAXLICENCE like '%'||#{taxlicence}||'%'
and FS_CONTACT like '%'||#{contact}||'%'
and FS_CERTID like '%'||#{certid}||'%'
and FS_EMAIL like '%'||#{email}||'%'
and FT_APPLYTIME = to_date(#{applytime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and FS_AUDITOR like '%'||#{auditor}||'%'
and FT_AUDITTIME = to_date(#{audittime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and FI_AUDITRET = #{auditret}
and FS_COMMENT like '%'||#{comment}||'%'
and ROWNUM <= #{endrow}
) tt where 1=1
and tt.rowno >= #{startrow}
